Posts.Content: angelical i’m sorry that this awful disease has you in a bad mental state. when i first found out i went into a horrible dark place. when my doctor told me the plan and it started working i was able to live again. it’s a new normal but i am still able to run a preschool full time and i am 1 1/2 years in. i pray you find that one thing to fight for and look cancer in the face and say” you are not going to control my life!
Posts.Title: Depressed...tnbc

Posts.Content: I’m sorry that you are having to go through this but i do want you to know it will get better. i agree with insure 18 once you have a plan you will be ok. i was diagnosed feb. 2018 and i felt the same way you do. with a plan and my doctor saying they treat this more like a chronic illness instead of a terminal illness made me feel soooo much better. please keep us updated. we’re here for you.
Posts.Title: Depression..

Posts.Content: when i was diagnosed in 2018 i had a pleural effusion and nodules in my pleura. i felt horrible and coughed so bad. after 6 months on ibrance, faslodex, xgeva, and zoladex my lungs were clear. i only had to have the pleural effusion drained once. i pray that you have a good response to whatever therapy you are on.
Posts.Title: MBC Mets to the Pleura

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear this. I hope they come up with a plan soon and that she is her old self again. She is in my prayers.
Posts.Title: Turn for the worse
